sentences.en: Conclusion Exogenous hTERT gene transfection could promote the proliferative capacity of hEF.
sentences.cn: 结论外源性hTERT基因转染可使hEF增殖 能力增强.

sentences.en: Conclusion The exogenous CGRP can inhibit pulmonary hemorrhage induced by ET - 1 .
sentences.cn: 结论外源性CGRP有拮抗ET -1 致肺出血的作用.

sentences.en: Disorders of old age are generally not exogenous.
sentences.cn: 老年疾病通长都不是起于外因的.

sentences.en: Endogenous variable and exogenous variable determine the economic growth together.
sentences.cn: 内生变量与外生变量共同决定经济增长是经济学的普遍规律.

sentences.en: Exogenous applications of indoleacetic acid, kinetin or gibberellic acid stimulate photosynthesis.
sentences.cn: 吲哚乙酸, 激动素或赤霉酸的外源施用刺激了光合作用.

sentences.en: Exogenous estrogen . Continuous exposure to unopposed estrogen results in endometrial hyperplasia.
sentences.cn: 外源性雌激素:长期暴露与无拮抗的雌激素环境下可导致内膜增生过长.

sentences.en: Exogenous variables can include lagged values of endogenous variables.
sentences.cn: 外生变量可以包括内生变量的后滞值.

sentences.en: EXPERIMENTAL STUDIES OF ADENOVIRAL - MEDIATED EXOGENOUS GENE TRANSFER TO DONOR HEART.
sentences.cn: 腺病毒介导的外源基因转移至供心的实验研究.

sentences.en: In normal persons, pain serves to protect the body from exogenous injury and internal disease.
sentences.cn: 对正常人而言, 疼痛是用来保护人体免受外源性损伤及内部疾患的.

sentences.en: The exogenous enzymes could significantly improve the qualities of Radix ginseng extract.
sentences.cn: 外源酶可提高人参的浸出率.

sentences.en: The usual Keynesian starting point, however, is to assume that the demand for exports is exogenous.
sentences.cn: 但凯恩斯主义的通常出发点是假设出口需求是外来的.

sentences.en: There are two main types of lipid pneumonia: endogenous and exogenous.
sentences.cn: 类脂性肺炎主要有两种类型: 内源性和外源性.

sentences.en: Various other exogenous drugs activate mast cells through a G protein - dependent process.
sentences.cn: 多种多样的外生药物通过一种G蛋白质依赖过程激活肥大细胞.

sentences.en: Vegetative rejuvenation of some bamboo species can be effected by exogenous GA 3.
sentences.cn: 外源赤霉素能影响某些竹种的有性更新过程.

sentences.en: When TS 2 holds we say the explanatory variables are strictly exogenous.
sentences.cn: 当TS2成立时我们说解释变量是严格外生的.
